name: Bullet Hell STG II Game
description:
Bullet Hell STG II Game is under attack of space intruders and the alien shooters. They destroyed all of squadron. You are last hero of galaxy and will be faced an alien shooter. Your goal will be quite challenging as you will have to save the galaxy from its alien enemies.
[How to play]
-move fighter to avoid bullet hell
-shooting the enemy and pick up gold
-enhance fighter's ability in the shop
